meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Kunzen Kristi Myers Lori Cain Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6107.

td.p: Tom Kunzen, a geotechnical engineer from Orlando, Florida
Kristi Myers, a graduate student and English teacher originally from Altamont, Illinois
Lori Cain, an insurance claims investigator from Altamont, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,000)

tr.td: JULIUS CAESAR
ROAM!
"B" WEAR
THE IDES OF MARCH
TAKE A STAB
ET TU, BRONTE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In his will, Caesar adopted this teenage future emperor as his heir')

Kristi

New champion: $28,000

(including 2 DDs),
1 W
(including 1 DD)
